alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 3:13AM EST until January 02 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence, Northern Franklin and Western Clinton Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light precipitation will quickly transition from a wintry mix over to snow this evening. Snow will then become moderate to heavy at times late Saturday night into Sunday morning, with snowfall rates around 1 inch per hour Sunday morning. As temperatures cool rapidly below freezing, there may be a thin layer of ice on untreated paved surfaces beneath the accumulating snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow plenty of extra time if travel is necessary late tonight into Sunday.

area.areaDesc: Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton
